title: The Surround Sounds of Music
description: 'The Surround Sounds of Music' has been developed for classroom teachers, music education teachers, and parents and children who want to have fun reading books about music. This engaging story contains actual knowledge and each page includes eye catching informative illustrations. An irresistible fun story that sneaks a musical education in the background. The characters Pocket Kangaroo, Wombat and Koe Koala, are bush animals learning about classical music instruments and the similar sounds of music that can be heard in their natural environment. When they meet up with Professor Anacrusis they discover that learning about music is a fun adventure.
author: Chrissy Tetley
